General.Name: Gigasolar Materials
General.Description: Giga Solar Materials Corp. manufactures and sells photovoltaic cell conductive pastes in Asia, Europe, and the United States. It provides conductive pastes for photovoltaic cells, such as front and rear Ag, and rear Al pastes. Giga Solar Materials Corp. was founded in 2003 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 3, Gongye 1st Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30351
